articles.title: Can understand India not playing the 5th Test, won't preach that what they did was wrong, says Stuart Broad - India Today
articles.description: Stuart Broad said that he understands why the Indian players were uncomfortable with the possibility of contracting Covid-19 when they were so close to their flights out of the country.

articles.title: PM Narendra Modi urges people to take part in e-auction of gifts received by him - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Items at the auction included Paralympian Avani Lekhara and Bhavani Patel’s t-shirts. The racquet that PV Sindhu used in her bronze medal-winning Olympic match was also a part of the auction | Latest News India
